Articles.Content:
I saw the announcement that Squad is working to get the improvements to the UI offered by Unity 5.2 into the game.

Thanks for working to make a quality product, guys. Take your time. I'm still enjoying the Sentinel mod, and I won't be upset if you need a little extra while to get it the way you want it.
So, you made a thread, to comment on a thread, when you could have just commented in that thread?
I guess I better not start that thread to reply to Alshain's comment in this thread.

I guess I better not start that thread to reply to Alshain's comment in this thread.

I had better not reply to this thread and bump it to the top of the forum list.

Aw, crap.

No, but seriously, I'm happy they're deciding to go the extra mile and rewrite their UI AGAIN for 5.2. Go team!
Right. Enough of that. Please keep the discussion to the other thread.
